body: Why can some players play and other not on the server? And how long will this problem take?
body_tagged: Why can some players play and other not on the server? And how long will this problem take?
title: Online on Avicus

replies.body:
Ive heard that we're having problems with the lobbies.
So you're going to have to use this up for the meantime.

1.8.avic.us

The old ip will be useable again in a day or two when the lobbies get fixed.
